the alcor illinois 7090/7094 post mortem dumpa dump technique for programs written in algol60 is described this technique provides an intelligible analysis of an unsuccessful computationprocess in terms of the original source program.cacm december 1967bayer r.gries d.paul m.wiehle h r.ca671209 jb february 26 1978 2:18 pm1086 4 14981132 4 14981234 4 14981263 4 14981265 4 14981270 4 14981323 4 14981358 4 14981379 4 14981380 4 14981453 4 14981464 4 14981484 4 14981491 4 14981498 4 14981498 4 14981613 4 14981614 4 14981781 4 14981781 4 14981787 4 14981825 4 14981860 4 14982083 4 14982178 4 14982179 4 14982252 4 14982325 4 14982341 4 14982546 4 14982645 4 14982652 4 14982684 4 14982842 4 14982929 4 14982934 4 14983069 4 1498669 4 1498679 4 1498691 4 1498761 4 1498949 4 1498989 4 14981215 5 14981498 5 14981498 5 14981498 5 14983184 5 1498
